meanings.definition: A person who adores or worships someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The adorers gathered at the temple to worship their deity.
meanings.sent2: The adorers of the famous singer waited eagerly for her concert to begin.
meanings.sent3: The adorers of the delicious cake couldn't resist taking another slice.
meanings.sent4: The adorers of nature found solace in the peaceful forest.
meanings.sent5: The adorers of art marveled at the intricate details of the painting.

meanings.definition: Those who show great love or admiration for someone or something.
meanings.sent1: The adorers of animals volunteered at the shelter to care for them.
meanings.sent2: Family and friends were the adorers who supported her through thick and thin.
meanings.sent3: The adorers of the new movie couldn't stop talking about its amazing plot.
meanings.sent4: Her adorers showered her with compliments on her beautiful singing voice.
meanings.sent5: The adorers of history explored ancient ruins with fascination.
